Password reset policy

Directly enable password reset: %(msPwdResetEnabled)s
Reset password hash algorithm: %(msPwdResetHashAlgorithm)s
Length of reset password: %(msPwdResetPwLen)s
Length of admin part: %(msPwdResetAdminPwLen)s
Maximum age of reset password: %(msPwdResetMaxAge)s
Send notification e-mail on password change: %(msPwdChangeNotification)s
